fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ultraguard (Night, 1 use): Guard the Unseen tonight. If any of the other Unseen members are attacked, you will deal an Unstoppable Attack to all players that visit the Unseen, give all other Unseen members Powerful Defense for the night, and deal an Unstoppable attack to yourself.
- Hyperguard (Night): Choose another Unseen player. You will make their visit Astral and up their Defense by one value.
